comments._description: Configuration file for mobile automation framework
comments._appiumServerUrl: URL of the Appium server (default: http://127.0.0.1:4723)
comments._udid: Unique Device ID - Get it by running 'adb devices' command.
comments._appPackage: Android package name of the app under test
comments._appWaitActivity: Activity to wait for (* means any activity)
comments._noReset: Don't reset app state between sessions (true/false)
comments._newCommandTimeout: Maximum time in seconds before Appium assumes the client is inactive
comments._enableFileAttachment: Enable file attachment in bug creation (true/false). Set to false if testing on non-Samsung devices where media picker UI differs
